texts.specs: Dig [color=title]2 tiles[/color] into the ground Recharges in [color=title]25.0s[/color]

confirm.header:
If you unlock [color=title]Jackhammer[/color], you will lose access to the [color=title]Earth Mover[/color] skill.
Future upgrades to this skill will increase the [color=title]depth[/color] of each dig and delay the tile refill.

receipt.footer: You will no longer have access to the [color=title]Earth Mover[/color] skill.

texts.overview: [color=title]Jackhammer[/color]'s opening upgrade increases the depth of each dig by [color=title]one tile[/color]. Each of the tiles will wait a moment longer before [color=title]refilling[/color].
texts.specs: Dig [color=title]3 tiles[/color] into the ground (+1) Recharges in [color=title]20.0s[/color] (-5.0s) Tiles refill [color=title]10%[/color] more slowly

texts.overview: The final [color=title]Jackhammer[/color] upgrade substantially reduces the [color=title]recharge time[/color]. Tiles you dig with this skill will wait even longer before [color=title]refilling[/color].
texts.specs: Dig [color=title]3 tiles[/color] into the ground Recharges in [color=title]15.0s[/color] (-5.0s) Tiles refill [color=title]25%[/color] more slowly (+15%)

confirm.footer: Doing so will fully upgrade your [color=title]Jackhammer[/color] skill.

texts.overview: You have acquired the final [color=title]Jackhammer[/color] upgrade. It substantially reduces the skill's [color=title]recharge time[/color], and tiles you dig with this skill will wait even longer before [color=title]refilling[/color].
